alert.note: Alert for Pratt (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Kiowa, north central Comanche and western Pratt Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 415 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wilmore, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Belvidere and Croft around 425 AM CDT. Haviland and Wellsford around 430 AM CDT. Cullison around 435 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Iuka, Byers and Hopewell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
